front.title: Simple Two-Way Active Measurement Protocol (STAMP) Extensions for Bit Error Detection and Bit Error Rate Measurement

abstract.t: The Simple Two-Way Active Measurement Protocol (STAMP), as defined in RFC 8762, along with its optional extensions specified in RFC 8972, can be utilized for active measurement. This document further augments the STAMP extensions specified in RFC 8972 to enable the detection of bit errors and the measurement of the bit error rate within the "Extra Padding" TLV of STAMP packets.
